WorkItem.ClosedComment: The main issue causing the Security Error has been fixed.
WorkItem.Description:
I have performed the Suggested Fix and continue to receive this error. If I am posting this message without having performed the Suggested Fix I am aware that I am consuming the Developer(s) time in managing my Issue unnecessarily.
 
== Error Message ==
 
[Arg_SecurityException]
Arguments: 
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.60129.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_SecurityException
 
== StackTrace ==
   at System.Net.Browser.AsyncHelper.BeginOnUI(SendOrPostCallback beginMethod, Object state)
   at System.Net.Browser.BrowserHttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse(IAsyncResult asyncResult)
   at System.Net.WebClient.GetWebResponse(WebRequest request, IAsyncResult result)
   at System.Net.WebClient.DownloadBitsResponseCallback(IAsyncResult result)
 
== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
This error occurs when using IE, Safari, and the stand alone version of Rawr.  The problem was intermittent after the latest release, but now occurs every time I attempt to load a character.

Comments.Message:
There is an issue with the Server right now and we are working with the Service Provider to resolve it.

Until it comes back up, please use the Rawr Addon to export your character or use a Saved XML file.
